column4: hi guys, I just install 11.10 on a machine that already had Fedora16 on an LVM. Ubuntu overwrote my previous grub settings and I don't know how to boot into my Fedora now. Any help?
run:  sudo update-grub     do you see fedora listed?
oh I see...let me look that up
I do not. I'm thinking that's because in a separate LVM
